data.name: Turtle Finance
data.description:
Turtle Finance is a decentralized trading strategy platform. It will be deployed in HECO, Solana, ETH, BSC, Matic. Turtle services financial strategists and amateur traders. The financial experts, in order to gain more profit, can upload their trading strategy to the platform.  Meanwhile, they get a share of the profits from uploading their trading strategies. For amateur traders, they lack high-quality trading strategies to achieve profits. So, turtle provides them professional strategies to arbitrage among different DEX exchanges, maximize funds, and gain profits.
Ecological Rules
”Turtle finance“ platform attaches five public chains and can carry out DEX arbitrage among different public chain Swaps. In terms of macro contribution, Turtle allows people to participate in providing market liquidity and improving overall market efficiency. In terms of personal interests, automatic sniffing market mislocations seize arbitrage opportunities to transfer funds quickly, and idle funds can be invested into the tripartite pool to maximize profits.
Features
Openness: Turtle Finance Platform serves two kinds of users: amateur traders and professional financial strategists. Professional trading strategies can be shared with amateur traders. Meanwhile, expert strategists can get more dividends through strategies they share. At the same time, If ordinary traders have confidence in their trading strategies, they can also submit their trading strategies to the platform.
Profitability: Arbitrageurs play an essential role in maintaining the health of the whole ecosystem in DEX. Turtle finance can arbitrage among different DEXs. At the same time, arbitrage opportunities will not exist all the time. At this time, Turtle Finance will invest idle funds into the safe and stable tripartite pool with a high return rate to earn interest for users.
Prosperity: The development of Turtle finance can further promote the prosperity of DEX. The relevant mechanism of trade arbitrage can improve the liquidity of DEX, more professional strategies, and more user participation, which plays a positive role in improving the overall market operation efficiency.
